title: Advancing the spatiotemporal atlas of the developing human heart - Nature Genetics
description: Spatial transcriptomics enables the characterization of diverse cell types with increasing resolution while retaining the spatial context of complex tissues. A study combines single-cell and spatial ‘spot’-based transcriptome measurements to identify cell states in the developing human heart and define spatial relationships within cardiac niches.

Subjects

Spatial transcriptomics enables the characterization of diverse cell types with increasing resolution while retaining the spatial context of complex tissues. A study combines single-cell and spatial ‘spot’-based transcriptome measurements to identify cell states in the developing human heart and define spatial relationships within cardiac niches.
